s.text: Heads turn at other desks as big-band music strikes up and the Diet Coke drinker spins away in his desk chair.
The narrator tells us that "everyone is singing to the sound of Diet Coke," and invites us to win CDs and trips to the Grammies by checking the bottom of the bottle cap.
Just for the sound of it."
On his knees, he offers a rose to yet another woman--and the spot cuts back to normal.
